title: [Peaceful Meadow, Forest Edge]
description: The forest opens up here to an enormous meadow stretching as far as the eye can see.  Tall green grass sways softly in the wind, and the stars overhead twinkle in the moonlight.
The forest opens up here to an enormous meadow stretching as far as the eye can see.  Tall green grass sways softly in the wind, and the clouds overhead move lazily across the sky.
